sentence: Coty Inc. ( COTY ) will begin trading ex-dividend on February 27, 2019.
A cash dividend payment of $0.125 per share is scheduled to be paid on March 15, 2019.
Shareholders who purchased COTY prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 10th quarter that COTY has paid the same dividend.
The previous trading day's last sale of COTY was $11.16, representing a -46.5% decrease from the 52 week high of $20.86 and a 88.83% increase over the 52 week low of $5.91.
COTY is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
COTY's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$1.64.
Zacks Investment Research reports COTY's forecasted earnings growth in 2019 as -8.15%, compared to an industry average of -1.4%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the COTY Dividend History page.
